location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of Bananas Irrigated from the Hamran Spring

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 86 x 138mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of banana crops irrigated from the Hamran spring [‘Ayn Hamrān, Dhofar, Oman], in the Sultan of Muscat and Oman's [Sa‘īd bin Taymūr Āl Bū Sa‘īd] garden.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
